title: Why Rent When You Can BUY!!
posting_body: Many renters think they don't have enough money to buy a house, when in reality if you're paying around $1,200 or more per month for rent, then you may be able to qualify for a mortgage and buy a home!
Owning a home has so many benefits, one of them being your monthly payments goes towards something valuable and you gain equity in your home.
When you are renting, your money isn't benefiting you at all.
It's just making your landlord richer.
If you are considering purchasing a home, please feel free to call/text
and I'll be glad to help walk you through the process.
I look forward to speaking with you
200 Glenridge Point Pkwy, Suite 100 Atlanta, GA 30342
